Thank you!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   
   
  I asked the question, "When people die, do they see a white light" and got a female voice that says yes.  This is on the Radio Shack Model 12-469.
   
  Please let me know what you think about the response. This is my first response on the radio.
